name: Science Girls!
description:
The school is under attack, and only the Science Club can save the day! 

Guide a group of schoolgirls as they fend off an alien invasion. Use the power of Physics to blast the enemy with fire and lightning, or melt them with Chemistry, or destroy their will to live with the dreaded science of Psychology. 

Explore the school, then track the enemy to their homeworld to put a stop to this invasion once and for all.  What ridiculous secret is behind these attacks? Only a thorough scientific exploration can find out!

Features:

  • Light-hearted storyline
  • All characters in party gain experience
  • Swap active combat characters at any time
  • Save anywhere, no need to hunt for save points
  • Customise your characters by raising the skills you prefer
  • Three difficulty levels for those who hate stress or enjoy a challenge

For tips and tricks, or to trade stories with fellow players, please visit the Hanako Games Forum.
